body.p: RAID Stripe State Structure is used to maintain the context information for RAID stripes. Memory for this structure is statically allocated as raid_stripe_state_t.

fig.title: RAID Stripe State Structure

li.p: Assigned flow ID for current raid operation.
RAID stripe status - flash write error.
Starting logical target of current RAID stripe.
Ending logical target of current RAID stripe.
Active logical target to send block open request in current RAID stripe.
Reserved logical target to write XOR page.
Active target to write user data.
Counter to keep track of number flash requests sent to the flash interface before writing XOR page.
Counter to keep track of number of block open completions received.
Pending number of flash completions for current RAID stripe.
Used by the advanced IPC Network API for message queuing.
